when I saw the video immediately I

you know driving home the the point that

so besides the

moving on to another another stage of

searching that we need to take
when we experience such tragedy quoting

don't think it's just an

call to look deeper inside
ourselves to be more accountable to see

improve life the
world that's what
remained I don't know what to
say you know on one
hand there's so much pain there's so
much
suffering there's so much shock when you
just hear about the massacres the
brutality so you can say so what is one
hopeful mess is going to do but on the
other
hand we don't understand so much and
perhaps there is a ray of light that

of a of a book I had the honor to
compose to write that is telling
us that there is something deeper going
on and don't lose sight and don't lose
hope we will get through it and even
death
itself can teach us
things I just feel humbled and honored
that of all books that God chose to keep

attack was a book that
I had the honor to
write it's not a personal thing the
truth is any book that had powerful
message I would say the same thing but
here it happens to be something that was
brought to my
attention my friends my dear friends my
brothers and
sisters both in
Israel and everywhere in the
world please
know that there is a light at the end of

Darkness what we need to do is take that
very lesson what is the lesson look into
your own heart look into your own soul
eliminate and eradicate any
form of Anger of violence of Bloodshed
even the most subtle
forms let us be more passionate about
the good about light and love more than
the passion that some people have for
hate darkness and
death that's the
lesson that will survive all the fires
and all the missiles the spirit the
human spirit that will rise and has
risen as we see and we continue to see
you know when you write a
book when you're writing it you own and
control what you're going to say once
it's published it belongs to the reader
it belongs to the people that
will have that book in their
possession I've been honored I've been

life but I never would have imagined it
ending
up in the
Carnage after a missile attack and
ashalon and being ending up
charred but yet with a message shining

telling me about the
Hope about the healing that has brought

to be of a different caliber not to
minimize the effect that it may have had
in others but here amidst such a
war book remains shining with a message
a message that's an eternal message it's
not my message it's a message that I
learned from my teacher and my mentor
the Reb who in turn passed it on from
Generations past that goes back
generations and All That Remains intact
that tells us that no matter what
happens in life some things that are
Eternal remain like the
Embers they may be Embers but they
continue to
burn they continue to illuminate they

you can
